website_summaries.verdict: Versatile unit that has all of the features you will want when in a remote area.
pros: With a 2,000 mAh power bank, you'll be able to charge other devices as needed
Easily pull in nearby AM, FM, and NOAA radio signals
Includes a flashlight and a reading light
Ships with a solar panel and a hand crank
cons: May struggle to pull in far-off radio signals

customer_reviews.title: Just in time for Hurricane Dorian
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this just in time for use during Hurricane Dorian! CHARGE THE BATTERY WITH ELECTRICITY VIA PHONE CHARGER UPON RECEIPT FOR 8 HOURS- MAKING SURE TO SELECT lI iON as power source. It doesn't come precharged and a few hours of solar and/or batteries doesn't cut it. I learned this the hard way, but in time for the storm. Then you will be sure it doesn't cut off after a few seconds of use. Having done that, you will be pleased with all this little, stout radio offers! Appreciate the weather/marine radio and the light sources (flashlight and reading light).
customer_reviews.author: MrsDoc

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: The radio itself is so small that it is nearly impossible to tune in stations. The reception is extremely poor. I will be returning it and buying a bigger unit that you can actually receive NOAA stations on.
customer_reviews.author: 50BMG

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This little radio does not radio absolutely useless wont pick up local stations at all the tuner is just there to play with and the volume control is worthless . But the packaging is great .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Neither works
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Neither of them works, not a single part. That's even after I charged them fully using the AC cord. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Leena in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: This came pretty quickly and the set up was so easy I was astounded. I literally took it out of the box and plugged it into the wall and let it charge. Took only a couple of hours. FYI: Before I did that, I did crank it just to be sure that feature worked. :) The radio reception was what I expected and, while the sound isn't comparable with my stereo, it is good enough for what it is for. The unit is compact, easy to use and has so many options/features. This is an excellent addition to anyone's safety kit - keep it handy Just In Case.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little emergency radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio/flashlight/usb charger is a really nice compact unit. The receptions is great, the Weather channel is a nice touch. I almost can't wait for a power outage so I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Wormington

customer_reviews.title: Works like described
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had an emergency yet, but we tested all the features and like this unit. Of course you hope you never have to hand crank because it's a full time job and you'd wind up with repetitive use injuries... But it's good to know it's available.
customer_reviews.author: The Fam

customer_reviews.title: Weather radio - good for short term emergencies, but not a long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: The product was cute, had a lot of neat features, great sound, flashlight, but I used the flashlight and the radio almost every day, and after a month, the flashlight didn't turn off one day, and the lithium battery for the radio went bad, so I cant use it when not plugged in the wall. I got a replacement to see if it would work better, and the same thing happened where it lasted less than 2 months, and then had problems.
customer_reviews.author: K. wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Radio does not function for NOAA Alerts
customer_reviews.text: Original description on-line claimed this radio was NOAA alert capable. It is not! While all Weather Band (WB) channels can be received, and the instructions explain how to set the radio for quiet on WB channels until a NOAA Alert is received, the WB channels stay on continuously when selected. Other functions of this very versatile radio are great but I bought it primarily for the NOAA Alert function. I did not want continuous WB broadcasts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The "Little Green" Do It All Machine..  ;)
customer_reviews.text: I have never even thought of purchasing a emergency radio until recent days, but I am glad I finally did. It's cute ( I know that's not important, but had to say it). It has a very powerful, clear, crisp, sounding speaker. I wasnt expecting that, due to the size of radio. The lights are bright, you can charge your cell phones (or whatever you may you need during an emergency). Overall, this little green machine will give you alot of bang for your buck. Rocam hasn't let me down yet :)
customer_reviews.author: Darcy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: I like the small size and the multiple ways to recharge it. It is great knowing I can tune in during power outages and stay informed of updates and news. It also has a handy flash light to help me safely traverse the house. Over all, it is a wonderful piece of equipment for my emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Essig

customer_reviews.title: Reliable radio for emergency.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the hurricane, never had a emergency radio so reliable. The radio signal is pretty good, loud SOS sound and easy crank handle for charging, the size is very compact and easy to carry, the seller includes a strap so I don’t need to buy another. The flashing light is brighter than old one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for size
customer_reviews.text: Was dismayed at the small size upon opening. I read the instructions while unit was charging - about 5 -6 hrs for full charge. Then I played with all the buttons! Easy to use and powerful for it's size! Not looking forward to disasters but feel more secure having this on hand and at the ready. It lives on a window sill with solar keeping the battery at full charge - a great feature !
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio! I use it alot now: in the garage, the bathroom, camping, etc The multiple power sources are great, especially being able to charge the internal battery using a micro-USB cord, solar, and having battery backup or hand crank if necessary. The weather radio function could be critical. I recommend buying this radio!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Berry

customer_reviews.title: An expensive plastic flashlight w/siren
customer_reviews.text: It is a very small radio with very small components,not incredibly well-made(i.e. the tuning bar is crooked,antenna is very tiny)and doesn't look like it will withstand much wear and tear long-term. The carry-strap is wrist-size,the compass the size of a quarter,and the reception where I live(somewhat rural) is very poor,which means when camping,etc...probably non-existent. Time will tell,but I would not purchase again. Does seem to hold a charge well tho,so maybe somewhat convenient when the powers out,which happens due to weather conditions here.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to have for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Here in northern California, unfortunately, emergencies are becoming more common. This little radio, etc is great and will be very helpful in the next emergency. The flashlight is super bright as well as the reading light. The SOS sound is very loud and would probably wake up the whole neighborhood. I love that you can charge your cell phone via solar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for emergency.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is much more than my expectation. First of all it comes with a rechargeable battery so I don't need to purchase it somewhere else, I heard it is quite difficult to ship goods from China with battery but this seller did it, great job! Also, it is with very bright flashlight and I can say this is the brightest one I've seen till now in a radio, of course the radio reception is great too, I can listen to the weather broadcast very clearly with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This works okay, but it’s really cheaply made for the price. The station indicator needle doesn’t even sit vertical, so you kinda have to guess about where the station is on the dial. I’d expect this to sell for not more than $20, and it’s still only a 3 star rating at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra

customer_reviews.title: Mighty little radio
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses it to listen to Baseball games and Sports talk show at home. We take it to the beach - it is light weight and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Go 4 it

customer_reviews.title: Super bright LED Light and more
customer_reviews.text: After having this for a week I have used it a few times. Used the work light for working in my vehicle after dark. It is very bright. I also charged by solar, which worked very well. The Radio tuned in pretty decently too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betz

customer_reviews.title: Will be great in the event of a hurricane -- or camping
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this radio as a preventative measure as I live in Florida. It does everything well! I like both the reading light levels and the flashlight levels and the radio comes in clear. I also like that there are several ways to charge it, so I won't feel like if one way fails all is lost. Thanks for making a great radio!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must have in the event of an emergency. The bright green color makes it easy to find and it’s lightweight. The radio works clearly and has a good quality sound. The flashlight does a great job of lighting up the space and the hand crank charging option is so important. I’m pleased!
customer_reviews.author: R&T

customer_reviews.title: Compact and different ways to power it.
customer_reviews.text: We ended up using this about two weeks after we got it. It came in handy with the weather band and flashlight. We lost power for 4 hours. The radio allowed us to tune in to our local news station as well. Small and compact, it went into shelter with us. Very pleased with this purchased, and the lime green makes it easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mark Enloe

customer_reviews.title: great little radio
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little radio. it has everything needed to track the weather and listen to am and fm. i am very happy with it. i would definately recommend this to any one camping out doors who wants to know what the weather is going to be like.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a gift for a young boy at church (got his name off the giving tree) who loves to go camping. I am so excited for him to have it. The fact that it is solar-powered will make it perfect for camping. And the color - so bright! Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chick

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for any emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little radio. I live in Florida so with the hurricanes and weather here this is a neccessary item for my kit. Sound is great and clear even on NOAA channel. Solor panel Charges too..2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bakeman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little ( truly) emergency multi functional machine
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing little emergency radio. I’m still shocked at how well it works and they thought of everything... u can charge your cell phone , have a reading light, flash light. Can run on crank power, solar power of AC power. Definitely strongly recommend this to anyone and just for camping . A must have in case of power outage
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great reception in rural area
customer_reviews.text: Pretty intuitive design. Surprisingly good reception here in our very rural area. Alerted us when weather condition arose. Battery backup is terrific. Arrived right on time. Can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TDubiew

customer_reviews.title: gift for family
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for some one out of state. They seemed pleased but will know if and when a storm comes. till them they are happy with this radio
customer_reviews.author: S. Sharma

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot with this
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Will update after we use it for a hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Raineri

customer_reviews.title: Poor reception AM and FM...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a useful product until I tried to tune in a radio station. The concept is great but the reception is extremely poor. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Markowicz

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: At first I didnt know what to expect from this little radio. After a few weeks of having it I love it. Charges battery pretty effectively and it's super easy to use. For the price you cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Great product that you hope not to use!
customer_reviews.text: My inquisitive son tested out the features of this compact emergency radio. It certainly works as advertised! I put it in our hurricane kit and will test it periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Thea D

customer_reviews.title: Nice little radio for the money.
customer_reviews.text: When the first radio was delivered, it was faulty, but the seller was very helpful and friendly, and quickly shipped a replacement, which works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Only con I have is that it doesn’t hold its charge for very long (probably if unused for 2+ weeks without battery). Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wong

customer_reviews.title: A Giant of a radio in a small green box!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio with Great reception. The radio is small enough to carry everywhere including my backpack when hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Vaillant

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect all around
customer_reviews.text: Love my radio, everything I need compacted it's light weight, small enough and I love the green tone. Very happy, great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: cecilia gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Full_Featured NOAA Weather Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made radio with lots of features. Just hope I don't have to use the Wx alert feature too often.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. I received the radio just in time for the last storm coming through. I dont watch nor have TV so it came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: cs webb

customer_reviews.title: A gem of a price for a multipurpose radio
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is superb. Overall, a great price for something with so many different functions.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good, compact radio with plenty of power options
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping never to have to use this radio, but in Florida you never know, and this little guy could be invaluable. It certainly has normal portable radio applications, but that's not what I need it for. Clear sound and good reception in a tidy little package.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kadmon

customer_reviews.title: Not Just For Emergencies!
customer_reviews.text: I find I have a lot of use for this product. When the electric goes off, which it does in our area quite often, I can charge my cell phone. It has a great flash light and I can spend hours listening to music waiting for the electricity to come back on. The reading light works great too if I wanted to read a book. I am very glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure I would buy it again, melting batteries could have possibly killed me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the bells and whistles however, the AAA batteries got so hot two of them melted. I got them out and I guess I can just use the lithium ion battery. Not sure if the batteries I bought from amazon or the radio is bad
customer_reviews.author: Robyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item in preparation for the hurricane season. 5 ways to power the device. Since it was night unable to use the solar and I didn't have any batteries so I hand cranked for 2 mins to charge. Surprisingly the LED lights and radio lasted for over an hour just with 2 mins of cranking. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JC022

customer_reviews.title: Battery time is great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this so that we would have a radio in case of bad weather. We charged the batteries and then ran this radio for 2 days straight and the batteries were still going strong. Worth the price. good reception. Hopefully we will never Need it for hurricane, but nice to know we have it.
customer_reviews.author: justmeinJC

customer_reviews.title: Good radio except for tuner.
customer_reviews.text: Tuner is cheep and hard to tune in. If it had a good digital tuner it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: PLCPROG

customer_reviews.title: This product is very compact and functional
customer_reviews.text: When I received my radio, I was so amazed by how compact, study and functional it is! I was so excited to try everything, the AM/FM radio, the compass, the flashlight, the weather band... And there are so many ways to charge up the radio, you will never run out of the power. I feel safer whenever there is an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Liu

customer_reviews.title: Has trouble holding major AM stations
customer_reviews.text: Just sitting on my desk the stations fade in an out, the table radio right next to it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: suddenss

customer_reviews.title: Sorry.... nothing worked.
customer_reviews.text: Could not pick up any stations on any band even though lesser quality radio picks up 3 local stations. Though new batteries used and AAA indicator selected, flashlight would not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. I love it. At first I thought the weather band stopped working. But I had it on the wrong setting. This radio works great and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: steven baldwin

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Options include a charging source. Will work great in a power outage and while traveling
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Great radio with 4 ways to charge!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase - comes with 4 separate ways to charge including solar, regular batteries, lithium battery (included) and hand crank.
customer_reviews.author: jenifern

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Came in timely manner we will keep in storm shelter as we live in tornado country
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lazzuri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Radio!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio, compact with lots of features. Bought as a gift and recipient was VERY PLEASED!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Sue

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful radio
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Nice to have something that can also be cranked.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The tuning knob was stiff. I wasn’t able to get many stations. It kept shutting off after I turned it on. Overall quality felt cheap to me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome emergency radio!
customer_reviews.text: All the features on it work very well, definitely something you NEED to have while camping! I highly recommend, everything you need in one portable radio!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Low power lights causes high pitched noise from radio
customer_reviews.text: When I played the radio and turned the flashlight or the light bar intensity from hi to low a loud high pitched shreek erupted from the radio. I probably would be using the radio and the lights at the same time (on low to prolong the battery life) so the radio being inoperable while low lights of any kind is not what I want so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This is very small and cheap, not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great Emergency Radio!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need this radio has it. Its perfect for an emergency
customer_reviews.author: Usbaldo Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Emergency Supplies
customer_reviews.text: I like that it solar and crank style... didn't like it was smaller than I thought it would be... Overall it was a great buy to add to my emergency supplies...
customer_reviews.author: linda rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Was of use. Would be nice if it would come on when an emergency alert is released.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: It’s small.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would be larger. From the pictures they had it looked like it was a lot bigger. But I think it’s gonna work for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bowlby

customer_reviews.title: One of the best prepper radios survival radios on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product with all the ways you can power it; solar battery,internal battery, crank and USB is excellent for survival and the prepper. I also gave one to each one of my sons and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, compact and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Emergency weather notification. The unit is excellent. It has so many features. Multiple ways to charge the unit. Bright lights, compass, carry band with a carabiner. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous little radio for the price! Outstanding reception and extremely versatile. Response from sales rep. via email on product questions very timely and informative. A highly recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is def what we were looking for. Works great woke us up with a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Most important things , this tiny thing let you about weather
customer_reviews.text: You have everything you need for an emergency chargers, lights ,
customer_reviews.author: Omar Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay charged
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio with lots of cool features but won’t keep a charge after keeping it plugged in for a long period of time. It works by using the crank but doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mihelich

customer_reviews.title: Get a better quality radio
customer_reviews.text: It is like a cheap toy. You cannot tune the radio much and it picks up very little channels. Also, mine came without a battery cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Gigliotti

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: This radio does everything for a reasonable cost... bought 2
customer_reviews.author: dennis e.

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: nice flash light for 39.00, other then that, its junk. cant pick up any weather bands, display doesn't light up, batterys don't hold a charge..
customer_reviews.author: robert szymanski

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: was much smaller than I thought it would be, little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: joanne perez-morua

customer_reviews.title: Product works as promised
customer_reviews.text: This product will be used in case of power outages for important weather patterns
customer_reviews.author: pallon

customer_reviews.title: Great Company to Buy From
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic radio for pleasure or survival gear. Fantastic customer service to resolve any issues within days!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy K. Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase and would definitely recommend. Easy to use and very compact.
customer_reviews.author: catherine vidal

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as advertised. Could not receive a signal.
customer_reviews.author: Soap Cauldron

customer_reviews.title: It has multiple ways to charge.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, multiple ways to charge, water proof, AM/FM, and multiple channels. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Benson

customer_reviews.title: The tuner is difficult to use. And the power is difficult to maintain, after charging it up.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the radio, but don't like the quality of the tuner.
customer_reviews.author: mike s.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst ever. Doesn’t charge itself doesn’t charge an I phone Doesn’t play radio Worthless
customer_reviews.author: michael castellano

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Came aday sooner than expected, works great and just as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Too much static.
customer_reviews.text: Has all the features I wanted but the radio has a lot of static, even on the local station.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hay

product_meta.title: Weather Radio - Rocam Emergency Hand Crank Portable Radio Solar Power AM/FM/SW/NOAA Weather Radio with 2000mAh Power Bank Phone Charger, 3W LED Flashlight, Reading Lamp, 7 Weather Band, SOS Alarm
feature_bullets: 5-WAY POWERED PORTABLE HAND CRANK RADIO - This weather radio supports 5 way to keep device powered. It comes with the 2000mAh rechargeable power bank to charge your cell phone, tablets or any other smart devices. In case the built-in Li-ion battey is power off, the solar panel and the crank lever can keep your radio powered. You can install 3 AAA batteries into the compartment when you are not able to regenerate power, also you can just plug the radio in wall with DC power adapter.

AM/FM/SW RADIO WITH GREAT RECEPTION & 7 PRE-PROGRAMMED WEATHER BAND - This portable radio has a wide range of band reception of AM, FM, Shortwave and NOAA weather stations with the extended telescopic antenna up to 10.3" , which has better reception than others. Also there are 7 weather channels are pre-programmed and numbered with 1-7 so you can easily find your local weather station; and receive the alert signals from the NOAA weather signals if there is a severe weather hazard in your area.

BRIGHTER FLASHLIGHT TO STAY SAFE - Light is important when you are in the dark, this crank radio comes with 3W flashlight and a 6 LED reading lamp, which are brighter than other normal radios in the market, with easy to reach switch button at the right side, user-friendly design to adjusts the light source of the reading lamp to the front, making it easy for users to set and adjust the radio when they are outdoors.

EXTRA LOUD SOS ALARM WITH FLASHING RED LIGHT & COMPASS - Simply press the SOS button for asking for help in case you are in danger, such as storm, hurricane and tornadoes, or in case you would like to warn someone else, the SOS alert sound is extremely loud and can be heard miles away. The compass attached on the carry strap can guide you to the correct directions when you lose your way.

COMPACT SIZE & WATERPROOF SHELL - The size for this weather radio is just similar with an iphone X, and we have included a carry strap and a hang buckle and it is made of strong ABS material which is IPX3 water resistance. Very convenient to carry for camping, traveling, backpacking or any other outdoor activities.
